title: is it just me
body: Is it just  me or after the new rank Q hit every time i get a  Q or in champ select, when lol is minimized to task bar if it fond a game or  if i was in champ select, if it was pick or ban it world bring the lol client to the top window full screen vids and all didn't matter, now it mite do that one in 5 times. tried it on 2 different computer's one windows 7 one windows 8.  is it just me?

replies.body:
Yeah it happens to everyone right now. I waited an extra 20mins for queue dodging today because my duo partner kept forgetting to check.

It isn't really that hard to stay involved for the 5 minutes that champ select lasts. If you can't trust yourself to regularly in on champ select, you should browse internet on your phone. Alternatively, you could spend your time getting to know your team in the pregame chat.
